channel.title: Directory on My Data Story
channel.description: Recent content in Directory on My Data Story

item.title: getwd() and setwd()
item.description: Many times getting started in any type of programing can be extremely difficult simply due to all the new terms being thrown at you. This is especially true for anyone who feels uncomfortable around computers in general. Here we are to talk about the basics of what getwd() and setwd(). The wd in these functions stands for ‘working directory’, for anyone who doesn’t know what a working directory is it is simply a folder that the program points to.
